contextId.information: "he told them to instruct Silas and Timothy." This can also be stated as a direct quotation as in the UDB. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_quotations]])
contextId.quote: they received from him instructions for Silas and Timothy

contextId.information: This can be stated as a direct quotation. AT: "he asked Paul, 'What province are you from?'" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_quotations]])
contextId.quote: he asked what province Paul was from

contextId.information: This can be stated as a direct quotation. AT: "But Festus said, 'Paul is a prisoner in Caesarea, and I myself will soon return there'" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_quotations]])
contextId.quote: But Festus answered that Paul was a prisoner in Caesarea, and that he himself was soon to return there

contextId.information: This can be stated as a direct quotation. AT: "and said, 'This man must be a god'" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_quotations]])
